text: The men's quadruple sculls competition at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv took place at the Plovdiv Regatta Venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 9 September 2018 || 17:15 || Heats |- | Thursday 13 September 2018 || 13:06 || Repechages |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 15 September 2018 || 10:34 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:16 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Eastern European Summer Time (UTC+3) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Dmytro Mikhay Serhiy Hryn Oleksandr Nadtoka Ivan Dovhodko | align="left"| | 5:38.31 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Dirk Uittenbogaard Stefan Broenink Koen Metsemakers Abe Wiersma | align="left"| | 5:38.97 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Caleb Antill Campbell Watts Alexander Purnell David Watts | align="left"| | 5:40.53 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Graeme Thomas Jonathan Walton John Collins Tom Barras | align="left"| | 5:42.90 | R |- | 5 | align="left"|Nathan Flannery Mahé Drysdale Cameron Crampton Lewis Hollows | align="left"| | 5:44.79 | R |- | 6 | align="left"|Filippo Mondelli Andrea Panizza Luca Rambaldi Giacomo Gentili | align="left"| | 5:54.30 | R |} ====Heat 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Szymon Pośnik Maciej Zawojski Dominik Czaja Wiktor Chabel | align="left"| | 5:39.13 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Dovydas Nemeravičius Saulius Ritter Rolandas Maščinskas Aurimas Adomavičius | align="left"| | 5:42.58 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Ruben Steinhardt Philipp Syring Hans Gruhne Stephan Krüger | align="left"| | 5:44.75 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Mickaël Marteau Thibaut Verhoeven Albéric Cormerais Maxime Ducret | align="left"| | 5:47.50 | R |- | 5 | align="left"|Artyom Kosov Viacheslav Mikhaylevskiy Nikolay Pimenov Pavel Sorin | align="left"| | 5:48.83 | R |- | 6 | align="left"|Erik Frid Michael Knippen Gregory Ansolabehere Justin Keen | align="left"| | 5:51.18 | R |} ===Repechages=== The two fastest boats in each repechage advanced to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the B final. ====Repechage 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Dirk Uittenbogaard Stefan Broenink Koen Metsemakers Abe Wiersma | align="left"| | 5:40.87 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Filippo Mondelli Andrea Panizza Luca Rambaldi Giacomo Gentili | align="left"| | 5:42.70 | FA |- | 3 | align="left"|Graeme Thomas Jonathan Walton John Collins Tom Barras | align="left"| | 5:45.55 | FB |- | 4 | align="left"|Ruben Steinhardt Philipp Syring Hans Gruhne Stephan Krüger | align="left"| | 5:48.13 | FB |- | 5 | align="left"|Artyom Kosov Viacheslav Mikhaylevskiy Nikolay Pimenov Pavel Sorin | align="left"| | 6:00.83 | FB |} ====Repechage 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Caleb Antill Campbell Watts Alexander Purnell David Watts | align="left"| | 5:42.81 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Nathan Flannery Mahé Drysdale Cameron Crampton Lewis Hollows | align="left"| | 5:43.21 | FA |- | 3 | align="left"|Dovydas Nemeravičius Saulius Ritter Rolandas Maščinskas Aurimas Adomavičius | align="left"| | 5:43.70 | FB |- | 4 | align="left"|Mickaël Marteau Thibaut Verhoeven Albéric Cormerais Maxime Ducret | align="left"| | 5:53.51 | FB |- | 5 | align="left"|Erik Frid Michael Knippen Gregory Ansolabehere Justin Keen | align="left"| | 5:55.03 | FB |} ===Finals=== The A final determined the rankings for places 1 to 6. Additional rankings were determined in the B final. ====Final B==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Graeme Thomas Jonathan Walton John Collins Tom Barras | align="left"| | 5:39.88 |- | 2 | align="left"|Ruben Steinhardt Philipp Syring Hans Gruhne Stephan Krüger | align="left"| | 5:40.69 |- | 3 | align="left"|Mickaël Marteau Thibaut Verhoeven Albéric Cormerais Maxime Ducret | align="left"| | 5:44.00 |- | 4 | align="left"|Artyom Kosov Viacheslav Mikhaylevskiy Nikolay Pimenov Pavel Sorin | align="left"| | 5:46.84 |- | 5 | align="left"|Erik Frid Michael Knippen Gregory Ansolabehere Justin Keen | align="left"| | 5:47.85 |- | 6 | align="left"|Dovydas Nemeravičius Saulius Ritter Rolandas Maščinskas Aurimas Adomavičius | align="left"| | 5:52.51 |} ====Final A==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Filippo Mondelli Andrea Panizza Luca Rambaldi Giacomo Gentili | align="left"| | 5:35.31 |- | | align="left"|Caleb Antill Campbell Watts Alexander Purnell David Watts | align="left"| | 5:36.51 |- | | align="left"|Dmytro Mikhay Serhiy Hryn Oleksandr Nadtoka Ivan Dovhodko | align="left"| | 5:37.28 |- | 4 | align="left"|Nathan Flannery Mahé Drysdale Cameron Crampton Lewis Hollows | align="left"| | 5:37.39 |- | 5 | align="left"|Dirk Uittenbogaard Stefan Broenink Koen Metsemakers Abe Wiersma | align="left"| | 5:37.91 |- | 6 | align="left"|Szymon Pośnik Maciej Zawojski Dominik Czaja Wiktor Chabel | align="left"| | 5:39.43 |} ==References== Category:2018 World Rowing Championships
title: 2018 World Rowing Championships – Men's quadruple sculls
